title: Laurie Binnie
text:
Lawrence Binnie (17 December 1917–1991) was a Scottish professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and manager who played in the <a href="English%20Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Mansfield%20Town%20F.C.">Mansfield Town</a>.
He was appointed as the first ever manager of <a href="East%20Stirlingshire%20F.C.">East Stirlingshire</a> in August 1966, but left four months later having won only one of nineteen league matches.
